compatibility.notes: FreeImage is a permissive license, allowing for integration with other permissive licenses without significant restrictions. However, care should be taken when integrating with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Comply with the terms of the FreeImage Public License.
Ensure that any distribution includes the license and copyright notices.
Acknowledge the original developers as specified in the license.
license.name: FreeImage
obligations: Include a copy of the license when distributing the software.
Include copyright notices in all copies or substantial portions of the software.
State changes made to the original code when modifications are made.
